thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 7 of 289
thread.title: Jonathan

author: Jonathan
title: Jonathan
text:
Not only are they great seats, but 5 other ticket sites (for the same tickets) were anywhere from $20-50 more expensive. Also once i purchased, i received an email from a Ticketcity rep with a discount code for future purchases. This rep also told me to contact them directly if i ever had any questions at all, great customer service!
Will definitely purchase again from TicketCity
